question: Which among the following statement is correct ?
option1: There are provisions that a retired judge of supreme court only can sit and act as judge of Supreme court
option2: There are no such provisions exist
option3: There are provisions that a retired judge of supreme court & high courts can sit and act as judge of Supreme court
option4: There are provisions that a retired judge of high courts only can sit and act as judge of Supreme court
answer: There are provisions that a retired judge of supreme court & high courts can sit and act as judge of Supreme court
